page.description: Way to override the default assignment. If you say DIM num as N = default 2 it will set your default value to 2.
page.syntax: DIM variable_name AS type = DEFAULT value

argument.name: variable_name
argument.description: The name of the variable to dimension.

section.note: If you try to set a dim as default value twice, the initial value that you set will be the one that Xbasic uses.
